Paint.Shapes
Interface ShapeIF

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractShape, CircleShape, EraserShape, FreePenShape, LineShape, OvalShape, RectangleShape, SquareShape, TriangleShape
public interface ShapeIF
extends java.io.Externalizable, java.lang.Cloneable

Since:
JDK 1.6
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mostafa Eweda & Mohammed Abd El Salam
See Also:
provides the default implementations for the shapes, Externalizable, Cloneable
